entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Summerland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:22 a.m. PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 17.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerland 5:00 AM PDT Friday 5 May 2023
Temperature: 17.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: 9.8°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 17.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 20 km/h. High 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low 10.
entry.summary: A few showers ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Low 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 5 May 2023
